response.changelog_device:
- July security patch
- Kernel updated to 3.18.149-Nosgoth_V7_MOD
- Radio was added back and fixed
- Google Camera Mod was removed
- Latest @SonicBSV Device tree modified by @shihabzz
- Latest @SonicBSV Vendor tree modified by @shihabzz
- Updated blobs from Tissot
- Updated Graphics stack from Aquarius X2
- The microphone gain is adjusted synchronously with denoiser microphone gain. By @Razziell
- Sticking of battery charge by 50% was fixed. By @Razziell
